% Extra layout tweaks for Pandoc-generated PDFs
\setlength{\columnsep}{1cm}% widen space between columns
\raggedright% left-align text (no full justification)

% Make pandoc's longtable behave like a normal tabular in two-column docs
\usepackage{booktabs} % usually already loaded by pandoc, but safe

\usepackage{longtable}


\makeatletter
% Replace longtable with a centered tabular
\renewenvironment{longtable}{%
  \begin{center}\begin{tabular}%
}{%
  \end{tabular}\end{center}%
}

% Pandoc's longtable setup uses these; make them no-ops / simple rules
\renewcommand{\endhead}{}
\renewcommand{\endfirsthead}{}
\renewcommand{\endfoot}{}
\renewcommand{\endlastfoot}{}

% If pandoc uses booktabs-style rules:
\renewcommand{\toprule}{\hline}
\renewcommand{\midrule}{\hline}
\renewcommand{\bottomrule}{\hline}
\makeatother
